findings.title: Token Manual Minting by Contract Owner
findings.description: The contract owner can arbitrarily mint tokens to anyone until the total minted value reaches the _maxTotalSupply state.

findings.title: Centralized Control of State Variable
findings.description: Critical state variables can be updated at any time by the controlling authorities without notifying users.

findings.title: Improper Reward Update in Claim Functions
findings.description: The user will lose the reward that has not been updated when claiming $ETH before claiming the reward token.

findings.title: Transaction Ordering Dependence
findings.description: The front-running attack can be performed, resulting in a bad swapping rate and a lower bounty due to concurrent execution using shared resource with improper synchronization (‘Race Condition’).

findings.title: Loop Over Unbounded Data Structure
findings.description: The migrate() function will eventually be unusable due to excessive gas usage and a failure in the execution of a vault will prevent other vaults from successfully executing the migrate() function.

findings.title: Insufficient Logging for Privileged Functions
findings.description: A privileged function that is executable by the controlling parties is not logged properly by emitting events.

findings.title: Improper Function Visibility
findings.description: Functions' visibility should be changed to external if they are not called from any internal function.
